name: Oliver (itch)
description:
Artists:

  • Loren West
  • Jemma Bartnicki
  • Kelechukwu Nwakudu (KC)
  • Jiayi Wu (Alice)

Animation students at CCAD create Oliver, a point click adventure game where you play as a city-born mouse who has made their way to the countryside. Watch the stream on Twitch and see what's in store for Oliver in a quiet country town!
